title: Find Entity by Label
desc: Use SPARQL FILTER with regex on rdfs:label to find entities
content:
1. Use `g_stats()` to check label property
2. Query with FILTER regex(?label, 'pattern') on label property
3. LIMIT results to avoid overwhelming output

title: Navigate Class Hierarchy
desc: Find subclasses or superclasses using rdfs:subClassOf
content:
1. For subclasses: ?sub rdfs:subClassOf <ClassURI>
2. For superclasses: <ClassURI> rdfs:subClassOf ?super
3. Check formalism level first - some ontologies materialize hierarchies

title: Use Bounded Tools First
desc: Always use bounded tools (sample, peek, stats) before full queries
content:
1. Call `g_stats()` to understand size
2. Use `g_sample()` to see example triples
3. Use `g_classes()` or `g_props()` with limits
4. Only then construct SPARQL queries based on what you found

title: Avoid Unbounded SPARQL Queries
desc: Always use LIMIT in SPARQL queries to prevent context bloat
content:
1. Add LIMIT clause to every SELECT query
2. Start with LIMIT 10 for exploration
3. Increase limit only if needed and results are small
4. Use FILTER to narrow results instead of fetching everything
